Soru: 1. John is talking about his weekend: 'I usually go to the park and play football with my friends. Last weekend, however, it was raining heavily.' Which of the following is TRUE according to the text?
Şıklar: John always goes to the park even if it rains.
John didn’t go to the park last weekend because of the rain.
John never plays football with his friends.
John prefers staying at home every weekend.
Doğru cevap: John didn’t go to the park last weekend because of the rain.

Soru:
2. Choose the correct option to complete the dialogue:
- A: 'Would you like some tea or coffee?'
- B: '____. I prefer water.'
3. In the sentence 'She has been living in London for five years,' which tense is used?
4. Which of the following sentences is grammatically correct?
Şıklar: He goes to school every day.
I am go to the cinema.
Doğru cevap: He goes to school every day.

Soru: 5. Complete the sentence: 'If it ____ tomorrow, we will stay at home.'

151. John is talking about his weekend: 'I usually go to the park and play football with my friends. Last weekend, however, it was raining heavily.' Which of the following is TRUE according to the text?
Şıklar: John always goes to the park even if it rains.
John didn’t go to the park last weekend because of the rain.
John never plays football with his friends.
John prefers staying at home every weekend.
Doğru cevap: John didn’t go to the park last weekend because of the rain.
